articles.title: Debt ceiling deal: US House overwhelmingly passes bill - BBC
articles.description: The Senate must approve the deal and send it to the president's desk this weekend to avoid a default.
articles.content:
The House of Representatives has approved a deal to allow the US to borrow more money, days before the world's biggest economy is due to start defaulting on its debt.

articles.title: There's a New Supernova in a Familiar Galaxy. You Can See it in a Small Telescope - Universe Today
articles.description: Astronomers discover dozens of supernovae yearly, but seeing one bright and close is rare. If you have a small telescope and camera, you can take pictures of a supernova flaring in the famous Pinwheel Galaxy (M101).
articles.content: The Pinwheel Galaxy, also known as M101, is a spiral galaxy just 21 million light years away. It’s a popular galaxy for photographs because it’s oriented to us face-on. This means you can see the bri… [+1607 chars]
